divs: sighting detailsafter the major rain fell from recent storms, i heard loud noises coming from my neighbor's yard. we live in a compact cookie cutter neighborhood so it was very close. i looked out of a second story window and saw bright pulsating lights above my neighbor's house with loud whooshing sounds just like you hear in the movies. i didn't know what to think and yelled at my husband. he looked out lower level window and we both immediately ran outside. it was so close it was scary. the noise was loud and we both thought the same thing. it was obvious. i thought something terrible was going to happen. i ran inside and looked out the window again, then grabbed my camera. i took a short video of the lights. by the time i got back outside they had moved about a block away. i hope someone else saw the same thing and also has photos\video. i also called the police and fire dept but they had no reports. this seemed like it was directly above our street on the nw side of indianapolis.
Summary: Bright red, blue, orange lights over neighborhood.
trends: There have been 126 other sightings in Indianapolis
There were 4 other sightings in Indianapolis on or around February 11th 2009
